你apply個hint之前條數係一條Second Order Nonlinear Differential Equation

Apply咗個hint之後條數變左成一條First Order Nonlinear Differential Equation

replies.msg: 55，如果我apply左之後，可唔可以將y prime square直接take square root 呢

你睇下點整走個 c
c=0 果陣：

(y')²=4ky^(1/2)
y'=2√ky^(1/4)
y^(-1/4)dy=2√k dx

咁就完

general c 唔識做，不過wolframalpha solve 到

replies.msg:
舉個例
Let f(x)=x^2+5x+6
then f’(x)=2x+5

So
f(3)=3^2+5*3+6=30
f’(3)=11唔等於零

因為f(3)係個value，唔係function
y(l)同理

4/3*y^(3/4) = 2 sqrt(k) x
y =[ 3/2 sqrt(k) x ] ^ (4/3) + C

in this question, C should be zero.
